attributes.action: Anglosphere - Create opposition to the EU
attributes.additional_details: Please vote on this notion to support an alternative to Brexit and it’s consequences. The anglosphere would provide an alternative to the UK existing outside the EU.
attributes.background: The Anglosohere would rival both the EU and US in terms of hard and soft power, cementing the UK’s place in international relations. The anglosphere would be the world’s largest economy and comprise of the world’s most powerful english speaking nations.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like to see happen.
